title: Understanding Intrapersonal Component
text: The intrapersonal component of cultural awareness involves self-reflection and understanding one's own cultural biases and limitations.

title: Reflect on Personal Awareness
text: Consider how being aware of your own cultural limitations can help you better understand and respect the cultural backgrounds of others.

hintAnswer: personal awareness of one’s own limited knowledge of the client’s culture
title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Which option best describes the intrapersonal component to cultural awareness?
choices: a variety of communities that are very different from one another
nurturing a community that acknowledges, respects, and has regard for people from all different cultures
Respecting and learning about the cultures of others while exploring one’s own cultural biases
personal awareness of one’s own limited knowledge of the client’s culture
